text:
<@U5Z2FQVT6> how you getting on with Tom as your mentor? 

He has experience in the army and his parents have both been in the police so should have some great insights to share with you to help you figure out 
:point_right:1.) if it's something you want to definitely pursue 
:point_right:2.) the best way of going about getting into it and tips to succeed in that role 
:point_right:3.) what you can be doing now to better prepare you for it! 

But you need to be open about your own experience and needs as well ask him as much as you can whilst he is around willing to share!! :+1: 

Take full advantage of the opportunity, even if it's asking him to show you some pictures of his training equipment/weapons! :muscle::sunglasses:
Try not to make your answers too short and too sweet!
